ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Anyone play PS2 EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope.  I am on the PC version on the Quellious server.  I met another mother last night and we had an /ooc chat about grounding kids from EQ for poor grades. I
ygData.messageBody:
Nope. I am on the PC version on the Quellious server. I met
another mother last night and we had an /ooc chat about grounding
kids from EQ for poor grades.

I like the fact that I group with different people. However, you
might want to check out our guild on Quellious. It's for adults
who have lives. www.adultisoltanto.org



*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 4/4/03 at rosepetal_eq wrote:

____Greetings and Salutations ladies,
____
____I am Rosepetal a lvl 17 elven druid who plays on the Castle
Lightwolf
____server in the new PS2 Evercrack Online Adventures. Does anyone
here
____play this version, and is on the same server as me? I think its
great
____that we women have a forum for our EQ addiction. I used to play
PC
____version, but got bored, and pissed off when all my friends had
no
____life and would level way above me, always causing me to find
new
____people to group with. I am curretly an Elder of the Arcane
Blades
____guild. Should anyone here play this game, I would love to meet
up
____with you in game. I am 27/f(of course)/Canada,BC. So hopefully
I am
____not alone in this. :)
____God bless and God speed,
____Rose
